The Quranic researcher said to him: He is praying with a burning fire that is buried in the free fever of the fire.Two characteristics and the last two newspapers, and it was said: The first three attributes, and this sentence is the news, (P-113) and everyone as it is seen.It was permissible to be this and the two sentences after the two sentences, and it is clear to the consequences of its circumstances.Ibn Katheer read in the narration of Shabl and Hamid and Ibn Muhaisn: “A and action,” with the persistence of the defamation.Abu Rajaa and Ibn Muhsin, Jacob, Abu Amr and Abu Bakr, read "pray" by the guarantee of the vit.
